PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-11572011-10-03,  ,  ,  DFAIT, 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Syria) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (SYRIA) REGULATIONS in order to add new names to the list of designated persons; prohibit any purchase and transportation of petroleum products from Syria and prohibit Canadian persons from making new investments in the Syrian petroleum sector.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0220 Publication Date: 2011-10-12
AttachmentsAttachment
